amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert a complete new text which codifies the EPA's Tailoring Rule in order to protect farms, small businesses, and small- and medium-sized stationary sources from greenhouse gas regulation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 12 printed in House Report 112-54 to codify the Environmental Protection Agency's Tailoring Rule in order to protect farms, small businesses, and small- and medium-sized stationary sources from greenhouse gas regulation.

action.text: Amendment (A012) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Kind.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 264 (Roll no. 241).
